shoes.name: Bata White Unisex Bullets
shoes.description: If you are looking for stylish products that last longer, look no further than BATA. This renowned brand produces very high quality products while catering to style comfort and global trends

shoes.name: Fashion Ladies Fashion Flat-Bottom Breathable Casual Sneakers
shoes.description: Unique design, simple fashion, breathable and comfortable sneakers, let your feet get the greatest liberation, and enjoy a cool and comfortable moment.

shoes.name: Fashion Ladies Sneaker Shoes Causal
shoes.description: These fashion ladies' sneakers are a trendy and casual shoe option that are perfect for everyday wear during the spring, summer, and autumn seasons. The upper material is made of PUMaterial, which provides a comfortable and breathable fit, and the midsole and outsole are made of durable rubber material

shoes.name: Fashion Mens Sneakers Shoes
shoes.description: These men's fashion sneakers are a stylish and comfortable shoe option that are suitable for daily wear or sports activities. The shoe features a front lace-up wearing style and a flat heel shape with a low heel height (1-3cm). The upper material is made of high-quality mesh, while the sole is made of durable rubber material with injection shoes technology.

shoes.name: Waanzilish Ladies Sneakers Pink
shoes.description: These Waanzilish ladies sneakers are perfect for running and sports activities with their breathable pink mesh upper, durable PVC outsole, and comfortable EVA midsole. These high-quality and light shoes are also fashionable and feature cotton fabric lining for added comfort.

shoes.name: Fashion Quality Classy Ladies Sneakers -Pink
shoes.description: These Fashion classy ladies sneakers are designed to survive the test of time and keep your feet comfortable

shoes.name: Fashion Slipon Shoes Loafers
shoes.description: These fashion slip-on shoes are perfect for casual wear, walking, and outdoor activities. They feature a black stretch fabric and canvas upper, rubber outsole, and comfortable PVC midsole. Available in sizes 41-44, these shoes also feature anti-slip technology and stylish canvas shoe laces.

shoes.name: Fashion Women's Shoes Sandals Frosted Middle Heel
shoes.description: These heeled sandals are both stylish and practical, providing a cool effect while flattering your figure. The solid color block heel design allows for comfortable and steady walking, making them suitable for a variety of occasions

shoes.name: Women Pointed Ankle Strap With Pendant Hunky
shoes.description: These pointed ankle strap hells come with anti-slip sole and wear-resistant design.

shoes.name: Waanzilish Mens Sneakers Shoes
shoes.description: These Waanzilish men's sneakers are perfect for spring and autumn with their breathable and hard-wearing PU upper, rubber midsole and outsole, and fashionable blue color. Available in sizes 39-44, these shoes are ideal for both casual wear and sports activities
